## isDefined() function

Determine whether a given value is \_\_not\_\_ undefined

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function isDefined<T>(testValue: T | undefined): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  testValue | T \| undefined | a value to test |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
